title: Effectiveness of pediatric asthma education program in the context of a general hospital in France: A retrospective real-life study
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Caroline Thach, Charlotte Lafont, Ralph Epaud, Kenza Tahiri, Floriane Sauvage, Virginie Sagorin, Virginie Sérabian, Céline Delestrain
